Upcoming Events

A Cog in the Machine II

October 12–14, 2018

We will be running ‘A Cog in the Machine’ at HLG Convention in October of 2018, as well as participating in the development of a blockbuster-style larp in collaboration with five other studios.

Learn more about this event.

Eskhaton

Spring 2019

Now accepting applications! Eskhaton is your chance to bring about your own version of the apocalypse. Join with other cultists to worship terrible ancient gods from beyond in celebration of the end of the world in this cosmic horror larp!

Learn more about this event.

Past Events

A Cog in the Machine I

May 16, 2018

The first run of our brand new larp about what happens when a cataclysmic event occurs and a ‘shadow government’ assumes control in the United States. You portray a member of this government and may come from any walk in life: a teacher, a logistics planner, a community organizer. What will you do when faced with this responsibility?

Learn more about this event.
